name: esg
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yahoo_finance.
Tool description: Access Yahoo Finance Realtime Stock Price |  Options | ESG | Trends | Statistics | Earnings | Balance Sheets | Analytics | Asset Profile and much more
API description: Simply explained, an ESG score is a measure of a company's exposure to long-term environmental, social, and governance risks that are often overlooked during traditional financial analyses.

symb.description: The stock symbol of the company for which the ESG score is requested.
